data.text: @owenbarden Hello Owen, bicycles are considered special luggage and are not counted as baggage allowance and you would have to pay an additional fee. To transport your bike you would need the prior approval. Please DM us your ticket number and share the weight and dimensions of the bike.

data.text: If you need to change or cancel your flight or request a refund, our teams are here to help. However, due to a high number of calls, you may have to wait longer than usual to speak with us. Alternatively, you can submit your request online, here ➡️️ https://t.co/GlEhg9d8Af https://t.co/slG3i8gQ3D

data.text: @jgooman1976 Hi, @jgooman1976. If your tickets were purchased directly through Air France, either on https://t.co/uUmLzqnw7f website, one of our Call Centers or via our Social Media channels, you can request an invoice online via this link: https://t.co/VJfC0T3J4L.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @kristina_ez Thank you for contacting us, Kristina.  Due to the constantly evolving situation related to the Coronavirus local authorities have imposed certain restrictions for several countries. It is crucial that you inform yourself if these restrictions apply to you. >>

data.text: @M3ilalUM3R We regret to learn about this, M3ilalUM3R. For an accurate information, we advise that you contact our Baggage Service team. You can find their contact information on our website via this link https://t.co/VgAMlgdH4d We remain at your disposal.

annotations.normalized_text: What To Do If Your Baggage Is Not Found

data.text: @M3ilalUM3R 2/2  For further information please read the section ‘What To Do If Your Baggage Is Not Found’ here on our website: https://t.co/EgkC60Ayw6. Thank you for your understanding.

data.text:
@cassie38398553 Hi Cassie, thank you for contacting Air France. We regret we were unable to reply to you faster. 

We regret to learn about this and help you sort this out. Please DM us your booking reference and the name of the passenger so we can assist you accordingly. We await your reply.

data.text:
@mspen12 If you're at the airport, you may go to the nearest Air France Desk and report your claim about the delay in your baggage. If your baggage is not located within 21 days following your flight, our Customer Care will start a compensation according to the Montreal Convention.
2/3
